text: The following lists events that have happened in 1848 in the Qajar dynasty. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Mohammad Shah Qajar (until September 5), Naser al- Din Shah Qajar (starting September 5) ==Events== * September 17 – Nasser al- Din Shah Qajar ascended to throne. ==Death== * September 5 – Mohammad Shah Qajar died in Tehran, Iran. ==References== Iran Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1840s in Iran
title: 1848 in Iran
